content.rendered:
Directed by A.R. Murugadoss.

Written by A.R. Murugadoss. A.R. Murugadoss. A.R. Murugadoss. Gopal Ram.

Cast Mahesh Babu(Shiva). Rakul Preet Singh(Charlie). S.J. Suryah(Bhairavadu (Telugu) / Sudalai (Tamil) (as S.J. Surya)). Veera Ravi Kumar Yalla(Vijay). Bharath Srinivasan(Sudalai’s Brother). Priyadarshi Pulikonda(Varun (Telugu) / Madhu (Tamil) (as Priyadarshi)). RJ Balaji(Madhu (Telugu) / Varun (Tamil)). Sayaji Shinde(DGP Chandrasekhar). Nagineedu(Commissioner Gajapathi). V. Jayaprakash(Shiva’s father). Dheepa Ramanujam(Shiva’s mother). Sendrayan(Rogue). Shaji(IB Head Mathews).Sampath Ram.Ajay Ratnam. Spyder Sanjay(Young Bhairavadu (Telugu) / Young Sudalai (Tamil)) . Rajsekhar Aningi(Bhairavadu’s victim (Telugu) / Sudalai’s victim (Tamil)). Ayan((as Ayan Nayak)).Md Ariful Islam. Jashwanth Kannan(Security Guard at Wonder La). N. Madhusudan(I.B. Officer). Hareesh Peradi(CBI Head).Rahul Verma Rajput. Sathviksriram(Shiva’s friend). Vignesh Vijayan(Intelligence Bureau officer)

Languages Telugu. Tamil. Malayalam.

Producers Sachin Agarwal. Ayan. Madhu B.. Rahul Gandhi. Raj Kumar. Prasad N.V.. E.V. Rajkumar. Sandeep Sharma.

Production Lyca Productions. NVR Cinema.
